text: Gorgan ( ; also romanized as Gorgān, Gurgān, and Gurgan), formerly Esterabad ( ; also romanized as Astarābād, Asterabad, and Esterābād), is the capital city of Golestan Province, Iran. It lies approximately to the north east of Tehran, some away from the Caspian Sea. In the 2006 census; its population was 269,226, in 73,702 families. ==References== Category:Cities in Iran Category:Golestan Province
title: Gorgan
